verses.verse: This then was the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>; even to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> was the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of the south coast <S%H8486><s%>.

And their south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was from the shore <S%H7097><s%> of the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, from the bay <S%H3956><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>:

And it went out <S%H3318><s%> to the south side <S%H5045><s%> to Maaleh-acrabbim <S%H4610><s%>, and passed <S%H5674><s%> along to Zin <S%H6790><s%>, and ascended up <S%H5927><s%> on the south side <S%H5045><s%> unto Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%>, and passed <S%H5674><s%> along to Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> to Adar <S%H146><s%>, and fetched a compass <S%H5437><s%> to Karkaa <S%H7173><s%>:

From thence it passed <S%H5674><s%> toward Azmon <S%H6111><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> unto the river <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of that coast <S%H1366><s%> were at the sea <S%H3220><s%>: this shall be your south <S%H5045><s%> coast <S%H1366><s%>.

And the east <S%H6924><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, even unto the end <S%H7097><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>. And their border <S%H1366><s%> in the north <S%H6828><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the bay <S%H3956><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> at the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Beth-hogla <S%H1031><s%>, and passed <S%H5674><s%> along by the north <S%H6828><s%> of Beth-arabah <S%H1026><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> toward Debir <S%H1688><s%> from the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%>, and so northward <S%H6828><s%>, looking <S%H6437><s%> toward Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, that is before <S%H5227><s%> the going up <S%H4608><s%> to Adummim <S%H131><s%>, which is on the south side <S%H5045><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>: and the border <S%H1366><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> toward the waters <S%H4325><s%> of En-shemesh <S%H5885><s%>, and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at En-rogel <S%H5883><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> by the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%> unto the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> of the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>; the same is Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lieth before <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, which is at the end <S%H7097><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> of the giants <S%H7497><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> was drawn <S%H8388><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> unto the fountain <S%H4599><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah <S%H5318><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephron <S%H6085><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> was drawn <S%H8388><s%> to Baalah <S%H1173><s%>, which is Kirjath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> from Baalah <S%H1173><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and passed <S%H5674><s%> along unto the side <S%H3802><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Jearim <S%H3297><s%>, which is Chesalon <S%H3693><s%>, on the north side <S%H6828><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> to Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%>, and passed on <S%H5674><s%> to Timnah <S%H8553><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto the side <S%H3802><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>: and the border <S%H1366><s%> was drawn <S%H8388><s%> to Shicron <S%H7942><s%>, and passed along <S%H5674><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Baalah <S%H1173><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> unto Jabneel <S%H2995><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> were at the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And the west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was to the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof. This is the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

¶ And unto Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> a part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, according <S%H413><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, even the city <S%H7151><s%> of Arba <S%H704><s%> <S%H7153><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>, which city is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>.

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> drove <S%H3423><s%> thence the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>, Sheshai <S%H8344><s%>, and Ahiman <S%H289><s%>, and Talmai <S%H8526><s%>, the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>.
And he went up <S%H5927><s%> thence to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%>: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kirjath-sepher <S%H7158><s%>.

¶ And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, He that smiteth <S%H5221><s%> Kirjath-sepher <S%H7158><s%>, and taketh <S%H3920><s%> it, to him will I give <S%H5414><s%> Achsah <S%H5915><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>, the brother <S%H251><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%>, took <S%H3920><s%> it: and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And it came to pass, as she came <S%H935><s%> unto him, that she moved <S%H5496><s%> him to ask <S%H7592><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%> a field <S%H7704><s%>: and she lighted off <S%H6795><s%> her ass <S%H2543><s%>; and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, What wouldest thou?

Who answered <S%H559><s%>, Give <S%H5414><s%> me a blessing <S%H1293><s%>; for thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> me a south <S%H5045><s%> land <S%H776><s%>; give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>. And he gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%>, and the nether <S%H8482><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%>.
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> toward the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> were Kabzeel <S%H6909><s%>, and Eder <S%H5740><s%>, and Jagur <S%H3017><s%>,
And Kinah <S%H7016><s%>, and Dimonah <S%H1776><s%>, and Adadah <S%H5735><s%>,
And Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>, and Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, and Ithnan <S%H3497><s%>,
Ziph <S%H2128><s%>, and Telem <S%H2928><s%>, and Bealoth <S%H1175><s%>,
And Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, Hadattah <S%H2675><s%>, and Kerioth <S%H7152><s%>, and Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, which is Hazor <S%H2674><s%>,
Amam <S%H538><s%>, and Shema <S%H8090><s%>, and Moladah <S%H4137><s%>,
And Hazar-gaddah <S%H2693><s%>, and Heshmon <S%H2829><s%>, and Beth-palet <S%H1046><s%>,
And Hazar-shual <S%H2705><s%>, and Beer-sheba <S%H884><s%>, and Bizjothjah <S%H964><s%>,
Baalah <S%H1173><s%>, and Iim <S%H5864><s%>, and Azem <S%H6107><s%>,
And Eltolad <S%H513><s%>, and Chesil <S%H3686><s%>, and Hormah <S%H2767><s%>,
And Ziklag <S%H6860><s%>, and Madmannah <S%H4089><s%>, and Sansannah <S%H5578><s%>,

And Lebaoth <S%H3822><s%>, and Shilhim <S%H7978><s%>, and Ain <S%H5871><s%>, and Rimmon <S%H7417><s%>: all the cities <S%H5892><s%> are twenty <S%H6242><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%>, with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
And in the valley <S%H8219><s%>, Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>, and Zoreah <S%H6881><s%>, and Ashnah <S%H823><s%>,
And Zanoah <S%H2182><s%>, and En-gannim <S%H5873><s%>, Tappuah <S%H8599><s%>, and Enam <S%H5879><s%>,
Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%>, and Adullam <S%H5725><s%>, Socoh <S%H7755><s%>, and Azekah <S%H5825><s%>,

And Sharaim <S%H8189><s%>, and Adithaim <S%H5723><s%>, and Gederah <S%H1449><s%>, and Gederothaim <S%H1453><s%>; fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Zenan <S%H6799><s%>, and Hadashah <S%H2322><s%>, and Migdal-gad <S%H4028><s%>,
And Dilean <S%H1810><s%>, and Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%>, and Joktheel <S%H3371><s%>,
Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, and Bozkath <S%H1218><s%>, and Eglon <S%H5700><s%>,
And Cabbon <S%H3522><s%>, and Lahmam <S%H3903><s%>, and Kithlish <S%H3798><s%>,
And Gederoth <S%H1450><s%>, Beth-dagon <S%H1016><s%>, and Naamah <S%H5279><s%>, and Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>; sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, and Ether <S%H6281><s%>, and Ashan <S%H6228><s%>,
And Jiphtah <S%H3316><s%>, and Ashnah <S%H823><s%>, and Nezib <S%H5334><s%>,
And Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, and Achzib <S%H392><s%>, and Mareshah <S%H4762><s%>; nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Ekron <S%H6138><s%>, with her towns <S%H1323><s%> and her villages <S%H2691><s%>:
From Ekron <S%H6138><s%> even unto the sea <S%H3220><s%>, all that lay near <S%H3027><s%> Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:

Ashdod <S%H795><s%> with her towns <S%H1323><s%> and her villages <S%H2691><s%>, Gaza <S%H5804><s%> with her towns <S%H1323><s%> and her villages <S%H2691><s%>, unto the river <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the great <S%H1419><s%> <S%H1366><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof:
¶ And in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, Shamir <S%H8069><s%>, and Jattir <S%H3492><s%>, and Socoh <S%H7755><s%>,
And Dannah <S%H1837><s%>, and Kirjath-sannah <S%H7158><s%>, which is Debir <S%H1688><s%>,
And Anab <S%H6024><s%>, and Eshtemoh <S%H851><s%>, and Anim <S%H6044><s%>,
And Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, and Holon <S%H2473><s%>, and Giloh <S%H1542><s%>; eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Arab <S%H694><s%>, and Dumah <S%H1746><s%>, and Eshean <S%H824><s%>,
And Janum <S%H3241><s%>, and Beth-tappuah <S%H1054><s%>, and Aphekah <S%H664><s%>,
And Humtah <S%H2547><s%>, and Kirjath-arba <S%H7153><s%>, which is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and Zior <S%H6730><s%>; nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Maon <S%H4584><s%>, Carmel <S%H3760><s%>, and Ziph <S%H2128><s%>, and Juttah <S%H3194><s%>,
And Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>, and Jokdeam <S%H3347><s%>, and Zanoah <S%H2182><s%>,
Cain <S%H7014><s%>, Gibeah <S%H1390><s%>, and Timnah <S%H8553><s%>; ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Halhul <S%H2478><s%>, Beth-zur <S%H1049><s%>, and Gedor <S%H1446><s%>,
And Maarath <S%H4638><s%>, and Beth-anoth <S%H1042><s%>, and Eltekon <S%H515><s%>; six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Kirjath-baal <S%H7154><s%>, which is Kirjath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>, and Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
In the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, Beth-arabah <S%H1026><s%>, Middin <S%H4081><s%>, and Secacah <S%H5527><s%>,
And Nibshan <S%H5044><s%>, and the city of Salt <S%H5898><s%>, and En-gedi <S%H5872><s%>; six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

¶ As for the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3201><s%> not drive them out <S%H3423><s%>: but the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
